lead_paragraph: The United Auto Workers filed charges against VW, claiming it is refusing to enter into collective bargaining for some workers at its plant in Chattanooga.

headline.main: U.A.W. Says Volkswagen Is Refusing to Bargain in Chattanooga
headline.print_headline: Union Says VW Is Refusing To Bargain In Chattanooga

snippet: The United Auto Workers filed charges against VW, claiming it is refusing to enter into collective bargaining for some workers at its plant in Chattanooga.
